fields.value: Replication Data for: Disentangling an elusive relationship

authorAffiliation.value: GESIS - Leibniz Institute for the Social Sciences

datasetContactAffiliation.value: GESIS - Leibniz Institute for the Social Sciences

dsDescriptionValue.value: This contains the code for creating the replication dataset from the individual survey and macro datasets used in the analysis as well as for doing the analyses themselves.

files.description: This is the main do file. It recodes and merges all the individual datasets to create the dataset for the analysis. It also conducts most of the analyses (bar the ones for which Mplus was used, i.e. the CFAs).
files.label: prq_for replication.do

dataFile.description: This is the main do file. It recodes and merges all the individual datasets to create the dataset for the analysis. It also conducts most of the analyses (bar the ones for which Mplus was used, i.e. the CFAs).

files.description: This does the simple CFA for political trust (Table B-3).
files.label: trust_CFA.inp

dataFile.description: This does the simple CFA for political trust (Table B-3).

files.description: This creates the factor scores of political trust for importing them to Stata.
files.label: trust.inp

dataFile.description: This creates the factor scores of political trust for importing them to Stata.

files.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for configural invariance across surveys (Table B-4).
files.label: trust_MGCFA1.inp

dataFile.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for configural invariance across surveys (Table B-4).

files.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for metric nvariance across surveys (Table B-4).

dataFile.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for metric nvariance across surveys (Table B-4).

files.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for partial metric invariance across surveys (Table B-4).
files.label: trust_MGCFA3.inp

dataFile.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for partial metric invariance across surveys (Table B-4).

files.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for partial scalar invariance across surveys (Table B-4).

dataFile.description: This does the MGCFA for political trust, testing for partial scalar invariance across surveys (Table B-4).
